tagline: A system tray application to receive twitter timeline notifications
body:
### TwitterNotifier
This small application is a Twitter client that lives on system Tray (works more or less on Windows Linux and Mac) and signals changes to home timeline.

### Future devs
Allowing people to reply/retweet upon notifications
Allow people to do bayesian filtering on notifications in order to be notified only about interesting Status.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Twitternotifier
